TopicTitle: can't enter VAB SPH AND TRACKING STATION

Articles.Content:
description of the issue: HELP I just updated a few mods and module manager to 4.0.2 but when I loaded up a save I can't either enter vab either the sph, I can't even go to the tracking station and even I can't launch any vessels (launchpad and runway menu works but can't edit vessels or launch them) however I can enter at research station, administration and astronaut complex , but I can't leave these facilities.the only way is by loading a quicksave.and also i can't quit to main menu.

ksp versions:1.6.1.2401 (x64)

mod list:

log files:ksp log:https://www.dropbox.com/s/qas8884h4yr6klk/KSP.log?dl=0 unity log(output log):https://www.dropbox.com/s/gwsnblvxdeqxi36/output_log.txt?dl=0
Just wanted to point out that Kerbalism 2.2 is a known buggy release.  The devs recommend reverting to 2.1.2.  Not sure whether that is the cause of your issues.
@AVaughani use latest, they also mentioned about incompatible issues with module manager 4.0.1 and above

12 hours ago, N70 said:

Do not download 2.2.

 

2 hours ago, Cruesoe said:

2.2 is incomplete, unstable, not finished, not ready, do not use, won't work, will crash, unsupported, not tested.. etc.

Game breaking crashes are expected.

 

2 hours ago, N70 said:

He's right though. 2.2 was far from ready, I just realized it too late.

Sure 2.2 is the latest kerbalism release, but it is so buggy the lead modder wrote "Do not download 2.2."  

Also according to the kerbalism thread OP,

Quote

Kerbalism 2.1.2 and Module Manager 4.0.2 and above are compatible.
@AVaughanso i use downgraded versions of 1.2 and it worked thanks
